# Quality Criteria QA3 and QA4 {#appendix-f}

Note cited/year = number of citations / (2024 - Publication Year)

Note: total articles is articles author 1 + articles author 2

\fontsize{9}{10}\selectfont

```{python}
#| label: tbl-qa3
#| tbl-cap: "Calculation of QA3-score (Cited per Year >= 5)"

from IPython.display import Markdown
from tabulate import tabulate
from lib.my_excel_lib import get_tables
from lib.my_custom_lib import xls2md

tables = get_tables('tables/slr_logbook.xlsx')

Markdown(tabulate(
  xls2md(tables['criterium3']),
  headers=['Seq','Source','Number of Citations','Year of Publication','Cited per Year','Score'],
  missingval="",
  maxcolwidths=[2, 8, 8, 8, 8, 8],
  showindex=False,
  colalign=('left','left','center','center','center','center')))
```


```{python}
#| label: tbl-qa4
#| tbl-cap: "Calculaton of QA4-score (Total Articles >= 50)"

  xls2md(tables['criterium4']),
  headers=['Seq','Source','Articles First Author','Articles Second Author','Total Articles', 'Score'],
  missingval="-",
  maxcolwidths=[2, 8, 8, 8, 8, 8],
  showindex=False,
  colalign=('left','left','center','center','center','center')))
```
